item.title: dmbm
item.description: Repository: https://codeberg.org/cyberme0w/dmbm dmbm is a bookmarking extension for dmenu, a launcher for tiling window managers such as i3 or dwm. Since it is not bound to any specific browser and instead uses xdotool, you can use it across multiple browsers, as well as any other program that accepts cursor input. This also makes it a viable copy-pasta board! It is written in bash, which makes it easily extensible, and stores bookmarks in plain text, within a folder-hierarchy.
